docker.name: RUN
docker.args: curl -fSL -o $GN_FILE      https://sourceforge.net/projects/geonetwork/files/GeoNetwork_opensource/v${GN_VERSION}/geonetwork.war/download &&      echo "$GN_DOWNLOAD_MD5 *$GN_FILE" | md5sum -c &&      mkdir -p geonetwork &&      unzip -e $GN_FILE -d geonetwork &&      rm $GN_FILE
docker.raw: RUN curl -fSL -o $GN_FILE      https://sourceforge.net/projects/geonetwork/files/GeoNetwork_opensource/v${GN_VERSION}/geonetwork.war/download &&      echo "$GN_DOWNLOAD_MD5 *$GN_FILE" | md5sum -c &&      mkdir -p geonetwork &&      unzip -e $GN_FILE -d geonetwork &&      rm $GN_FILE
